La passione e la dedizione per la cucina: Passion and dedication to cooking have made the restaurant famous, where Aldo and later his son Raffaele have upheld the tradition of grandfather Andrea, using fresh and handmade ingredients, like homemade pasta.
Da oltre 25 anni, Raffaele gestisce con: For over 25 years, Raffaele has carefully and meticulously managed the restaurant-pizzeria “La Bruschetta e…”, making it a landmark for the neighborhood. The place perfectly blends the family's historical tradition and the search for raw materials to satisfy all tastes.
Contattaci per saperne di più e ottenere: Contact us to learn more and get a personalized offer for your team.
La pizza è un grande classico della nost: Pizza is a great classic of our tradition, a dish that represents Italy all over the world. Our pizza is homemade with natural leavening and baked in a wood-fired oven. Our guests are no longer just customers but become creators of their pizza, enjoying complete freedom.

Questa Informativa sulla privacy descriv: This Privacy Policy describes the policies of La Bruschetta e…SRL, Via Sardegna, 39, Rome 00187, Italy, email: labruschettae01@gmail.com, phone: 0642013721 regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your information that we collect when you use our website (https://labruschettaroma.com) (the “Service”). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information in accordance with this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not access or use the Service.
Potremmo modificare questa Informativa s: We may update this Privacy Policy at any time without prior notice and will post the revised Privacy Policy on the Service. The revised policy will be effective 180 days from the date of posting and your continued access to or use of the Service after such time will constitute your acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy. We therefore encourage you to review this page periodically.
A seconda della legge applicabile, potre: Depending on the applicable law, you may have the right to access and rectify or delete your personal data or receive a copy of your personal data, restrict or object to the active processing of your data, request us to share (port) your personal information with another entity, withdraw any consent provided to us for processing your data, a right to lodge a complaint with a statutory authority, and such other rights as may be relevant under applicable laws. To exercise these rights, you can write to us at labruschettae01@gmail.com. We will respond to your request in accordance with applicable law.
Si prega di notare che se non ci consent: Please note that if you do not consent to our collection or processing of the necessary personal information, or if you withdraw consent to process such information for the requested purposes, you may not be able to access or use the services for which your information was requested.
Per saperne di più su come utilizziamo q: To learn more about how we use these and your choices regarding these tracking technologies, please consult our Cookie Policy.
Adottiamo misure di sicurezza per proteg: We take security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data. For any concerns about the security of your data, please contact us.
Se hai domande o preoccupazioni riguardo: If you have any questions or concerns regarding the processing of your information held by us, you can email our Data Protection Officer at La Bruschetta e…SRL, Via Sardegna, 39, email: labruschettae01@gmail.com. We will address your concerns in accordance with applicable law.
Questa Informativa sui cookie spiega cos: This Cookie Policy explains what a cookie is and how we use it, the types of cookies we use, i.e., the information we collect through cookies and how it is used, and how to manage cookie settings.
I cookie sono piccoli file di testo che: Cookies are small text files that are used to store small amounts of information. They are stored on your device when the website is loaded on your browser. These cookies help us make the website function properly, make it more secure, provide a better user experience, and understand how the website works and where improvements are needed.
Come la maggior parte dei servizi online: Like most online services, our website uses both first-party and third-party cookies for various purposes. First-party cookies are mainly necessary for the website to function properly and do not collect any personally identifiable data.
I cookie di terze parti utilizzati sul n: Third-party cookies used on our website are primarily used to understand how the website functions, how you interact with our website, to keep our services secure, to provide relevant advertising to you, and generally to provide you with a better user experience and speed up your future interactions with our website.
Puoi modificare le preferenze dei cookie: You can modify your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the button above. This will allow you to review the cookie consent banner and change your preferences or withdraw your consent immediately.
Inoltre, i diversi browser forniscono me: Additionally, different browsers provide various methods for blocking and deleting cookies used by websites. You can adjust your browser settings to block/delete cookies. Below are links to support documents on how to manage and delete cookies from major web browsers.
Se si utilizza un altro browser web, si: If you use another web browser, please visit the official support documents for your browser.
